name: HELIPRO
baseAirport: SBP -San Luis Obispo County Regional Airport
about: Helipro, established in 1993, is a renowned flight school based in San Luis Obispo, California, offering professional helicopter pilot training to students worldwide. With 30 years of experience, Helipro is FAA-approved under FAR Part 141 and Part 61. Our international approach, with operations in the USA, Italy, and Nepal, ensures a job-oriented training methodology with exceptional outcomes. Our low student-to-instructor ratio is supported by highly qualified and experienced instructors. Located in sunny California, our students benefit from perfect weather conditions and diverse flying scenarios within the San Francisco-Los Angeles-Las Vegas triangle. Our fleet includes Robinson 22, Robinson 44, Bell 206 Jetranger 3 helicopters, and professional flight simulators. We provide personalized training at competitive prices, fostering a close-knit community that feels like a family. At Helipro, we are committed to preparing our students for the challenges of the real aviation world.
